title: ATA Carnets (temporary import/export)
dataVerified: Carnet holder, goods description, destination countries, customs authorities
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Carnet status (valid/closed/expired). Link to issuing chamber/customs system (holder and customs, requires authentication)
rationale: Prevents fake ATA Carnets (temporary import fraud). Domain binding verifies issuing chamber/customs. International trade show equipment. Prevents permanent import of temporary goods. World Customs Organization (WCO) compliance.
